fullText:
We noticed you're using an ad blocker.
			We get it: you like to have control of your own internet experience. But advertising revenue helps support our journalism. To read our full stories, please turn off your ad blocker.We'd really appreciate it.

Below are steps you can take in order to whitelist Observer.com on your browser:

Click the AdBlock button on your browser and select Don't run on pages on this domain.

Click the AdBlock Plus button on your browser and select Enabled on this site.

Click the AdBlock Plus button on your browser and select Disable on Observer.com.
dtliExcerpt: Moulin Rouge! The Musical is a spectacle that dazzles the eye and assaults the senses in ways both good and bad—it's simultaneously thrilling and exhausting.
showScoreExcerpt: Moulin Rouge! The Musical is a spectacle that dazzles the eye and assaults the senses in ways both good and bad—it's simultaneously thrilling and exhausting.

keyPhrases.quote: assaults the senses in ways both good and bad

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The review presents a balanced assessment that acknowledges both positive spectacle ('dazzles') and negative overwhelm ('exhausting'), suggesting a mixed experience without clear recommendation. | GPT-4o-mini: The review presents a mix of admiration for the visual spectacle and criticism of its overwhelming nature, leading to a conditional recommendation.
